screen1.title: Learn and Communicate with Sign Language
screen1.desc: Learn sign language , translate instantly and connect with confidence.
screen2.title: Learn Sign Language Visually
screen2.desc: Interactive lessons , videos , and quizzes designed for everyone.
screen3.title: Instant Translation
screen3.desc: Translate sign langauge and speech to text in realtime.
screen4.title: Learn Through Play
screen4.desc: Games that help you practise signs and improve faster.
screen5.title: How would you like to use the app?
screen5.desc1: Choose a mode to get the best experience.You can change this later in settings.
mode1.desc: Learn sign language through lessons, games, and quizzes.
mode2.desc: Translate sign language and speech instantly
screen5.desc2: Not sure?You cann switch modes anytime.Both Modes include full accessibility support.
screen6.title: Welcome to ASSISTIVE MODE
screen6.desc: This mode helps you commuincate instanlty using real-time translation.
screen7.title: Welcome to LEARNING Mode
screen7.desc: This mode helps you learn sign language step by step through interactive content.

agreement: I agree to the processing of personal data
login.title: Welcome Back!
otp.title: Enter your OTP
otp.desc: For you security, We have sent a One-Time code to your e-mail user@gmail.com.Enter it to access your account.
forget.title: Forget Password?
forget.desc: Please enter your email to recieve a confirmation code to set a new password
new.title: Set New Password
new.desc: Your new password should be different from the previous old password
home1.submessage: Because everyone deserves to be understood
home1.service1.desc: Start from the basics and build your signing skills step by step.
home1.service2.desc: Find any sign instantly , exactly when you need it.
home1.service4.desc: Interactive games to learn sign language.
